channel.title: ~~~Changing EXP Rate on a 508~~~
channel.description: I have the Tokkulscape source, and its 508. How do I change the exp rate for combat on it? It's a little slow and I would like to make it a little higher.

item.title: ~~~Changing EXP Rate on a 508~~~
item.dc:creator: @klump klump
item.description:
@klump wrote:

ehm … i think it is in : player/combat/playernpccombat… search for hitDamage

and you will find sumthing like : p.addSkillXP(320 * hitDamage * CombatXPRate ,0);

then u change the : 320 or what else ther is to what you want

PS!.. in the top there should be : public int CombatXPRate = **; … change the combatXPRate = “1” then u ur only getting 320… if it was : 3 u would get 3320 xp in the combat skill u train

Read full topic
